snippet: Fearing leaks to high-speed traders, the government is overhauling its “lockup room,” where news media wait to hear new inflation numbers, jobless rates and other critical information.
abstract: Labor Department, fearing leaks to high-speed traders, is overhauling its 'lockup room,' where news media wait to hear new inflation numbers, jobless rates and other critical information; security is being tightened for market-sensitive data.
lead_paragraph: Fearing leaks to high-speed traders, the government is overhauling its “lockup room,” where news media wait to hear new inflation numbers, jobless rates and other critical information.

headline.seo: Labor Dept. Tightens Security for Market-Sensitive Data
headline.main: U.S. Tightens Security for Economic Data
